text: Nalikane padha didhawuhi mangkene, "Kowe padha mewehana rizki kang wis padha diparengake dening Allah marang kowe." Wong kang padha kafir banjur padha mangsuli marang wong mukmin, "Ya gene aku aweh pangan marang sawijining wong, kang manawa ana parenge kersane Allah, Allah paring rizki marang wong mau, anggomu akon meweh marang wong mahu, tetela kesasar
